markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Climbing Bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=160)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 559 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [bolt](/Weapons.aspx?ID=81)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The shaft of this bolt is wrapped with fine twine. When the bolt strikes a solid surface, the twine unwinds and enlarges into a 50-foot-long rope, securely fastened to the surface the bolt struck. The rope can be pulled free with an Interact action and a successful DC 20 Athletics check.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Climbing Bolt

text: <title level="1" right="Item 4" pfs="Standard" > Climbing Bolt Source Core Rulebook pg. 559 4.0 Price 15 gp Ammunition bolt --- The shaft of this bolt is wrapped with fine twine. When the bolt strikes a solid surface, the twine unwinds and enlarges into a 50-foot-long rope, securely fastened to the surface the bolt struck. The rope can be pulled free with an Interact action and a successful DC 20 Athletics check.
